018package org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.codebuilders;
019
020import static java.lang.reflect.Modifier.isPublic;
021import static java.lang.reflect.Modifier.isStatic;
022import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.FINAL;
023import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PRIVATE;
024import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PUBLIC;
025import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.DEFAULT_ACCESSOR_TYPE;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.ENUM_ACCESSOR_TYPE;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.LIST_ACCESSOR_TYPE;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MAP_ACCESSOR_TYPE;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_AccessorMissing;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_MissingEnvironmentVar;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_MissingStringConverter;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_MissingStringConverterWithType;
034import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_MissingSystemProp;
035import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_NoCollection;
036import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.MSG_PreferencesNotConfigured;
037import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.ConfigAnnotationProcessor.SET_ACCESSOR_TYPE;
038import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.ALLOWS_PREFERENCES;
039import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.GETTER_RETURNS_OPTIONAL;
040import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.PROPERTY_IS_ARGUMENT;
041import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.PROPERTY_IS_MUTABLE;
042import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.PROPERTY_IS_OPTION;
043import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.PROPERTY_REQUIRES_SYNCHRONIZATION;
044import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.SETTER_CHECK_EMPTY;
045import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.SETTER_CHECK_NULL;
046import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec.PropertyFlag.SYSTEM_PREFERENCE;
047import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_ListenerSupport;
048import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_ReadLock;
049import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.CodeBuilder.StandardField.STD_FIELD_WriteLock;
050import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.codebuilders.CodeBuilderBase.StringConverterInstantiation.AS_ENUM;
051import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.codebuilders.CodeBuilderBase.StringConverterInstantiation.BY_INSTANCE;
052import static org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.impl.codebuilders.CodeBuilderBase.StringConverterInstantiation.THROUGH_CONSTRUCTOR;
053import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.Primitives.VOID;
054import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.EMPTY_STRING;
055import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
056import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
057import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;

059import java.util.ArrayList;

075import org.apiguardian.api.API;

077import org.tquadrat.foundation.ap.CodeGenerationError;
078import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.CodeGenerationConfiguration;
079import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ap.PropertySpec;

099/**
100 *  The abstract base class for all the code builders.
101 *
102 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
103 *  @version $Id: CodeBuilderBase.java 1010 2022-02-05 19:28:36Z tquadrat $
104 *  @UMLGraph.link
105 *  @since 0.1.0
106 */
107@SuppressWarnings( {"OverlyCoupledClass", "OverlyComplexClass"} )
108@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: CodeBuilderBase.java 1010 2022-02-05 19:28:36Z tquadrat $" )
109@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.1.0" )
110abstract sealed class CodeBuilderBase implements CodeBuilder
111    permits CLIBeanBuilder, ConfigBeanBuilder, I18nSupportBuilder, INIBeanBuilder, MapImplementor, PreferencesBeanBuilder, SessionBeanBuilder
112{
113        /*---------------*\
114    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
115        \*---------------*/
116    /**
117     *  The various type to instantiate a
118     *  {@link StringConverter}
119     *  class.
120     *
121     *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
122     *  @version $Id: CodeBuilderBase.java 1010 2022-02-05 19:28:36Z tquadrat $
123     *  @UMLGraph.link
124     *  @since 0.1.0
125     */
126    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: CodeBuilderBase.java 1010 2022-02-05 19:28:36Z tquadrat $" )
127    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.1.0" )
128    public static enum StringConverterInstantiation
129    {
130        /**
131         *  The
132         *  {@link StringConverter}
133         *  can be accessed through the {@code INSTANCE} field.
134         */
135        BY_INSTANCE,
136
137        /**
138         *  The
139         *  {@link StringConverter}
140         *  has to be instantiated by calling its default constructor.
141         */
142        THROUGH_CONSTRUCTOR,
143
144        /**
145         *  The property is an
146         *  {@link Enum enum},
147         *  and the class for the
148         *  {@link StringConverter}
149         *  is
150         *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.util.stringconverter.EnumStringConverter},
151         *  so the {@code StringConverter} has to be instantiated by a call to
152         *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.util.stringconverter.EnumStringConverter#EnumStringConverter(Class)}.
153         */
154        AS_ENUM
155    }
156    //  enum StringConverterInstantiation
157
158
159        /*------------*\
160    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
161        \*------------*/
162    /**
163     *  The class builder.
164     */
165    private final TypeSpec.Builder m_ClassBuilder;
166
167    /**
168     *  The composer.
169     */
170    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
171    private final JavaComposer m_Composer;
172
173    /**
174     *  The configuration for the code generation.
175     */
176    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
177    private final CodeGenerationConfiguration m_Configuration;
178
179    /**
180     *  The builder for body of the constructor.
181     */
182    private final CodeBlock.Builder m_ConstructorCode;
183
184    /**
185     *  The code generator context.
186     */
187    private final CodeGeneratorContext m_Context;
188
189    /**
190     *  The synchronised flag.
191     */
192    private final boolean m_IsSynchronized;
193
194    /**
195     *  The standard fields.
196     */
197    private static final Map<StandardField,FieldSpec> m_StandardFields = new EnumMap<>( StandardField.class );
198
199    /**
200     *  The standard methods.
201     */
202    private static final Map<StandardMethod,MethodSpec> m_StandardMethods = new EnumMap<>( StandardMethod.class );
203
204        /*------------------------*\
205    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
206        \*------------------------*/
207    /**
208     *  The registry for the known implementations of
209     *  {@link StringConverter}
210     *  implementations.
211     */
212    private static final LazyMap<TypeName,TypeName> m_ConverterRegistry;
213
214    static
215    {
216        m_ConverterRegistry = LazyMap.use( true, CodeBuilderBase::loadStringConverters );
217    }
218
219        /*--------------*\
220    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
221        \*--------------*/
222    /**
223     *  Creates a new instance of {@code CodeBuilderBase}.
224     *
225     *  @param  context The code generator context.
226     */
227    protected CodeBuilderBase( final CodeGeneratorContext context )
228    {
229        m_Context = requireNonNullArgument( context, "context" );
230
231        m_Configuration = m_Context.getConfiguration();
232        m_Composer = m_Configuration.getComposer();
233        m_ClassBuilder = m_Context.getClassBuilder();
234        m_ConstructorCode = m_Context.getConstructorCodeBuilder();
235
236        m_IsSynchronized = m_Configuration.getSynchronizationRequired();
237
238        m_Configuration.getInitDataMethod().ifPresent( m -> m_StandardMethods.put( StandardMethod.STD_METHOD_InitData, m ) );
239    }   //  CodeBuilderBase()
240
241        /*---------*\
242    ====** Methods **==========================================================
243        \*---------*/
244    /**
245     *  Adds an argument to the constructor.
246     *
247     *  @param  argument    The parameter to add.
248     */
249    protected final void addConstructorArgument( final ParameterSpec argument )
250    {
251        final var constructorBuilder = m_Context.getConstructorBuilder();
252        constructorBuilder.addParameter( requireNonNullArgument( argument, "argument" ) );
253    }   //  addConstructorArgument()
254
255    /**
256     *  Adds code to the constructor body.
257     *
258     *  @param  code    The code to add.
259     */
260    protected final void addConstructorCode( final CodeBlock code )
261    {
262        m_ConstructorCode.add( requireNonNullArgument( code, "code" ) );
263    }   //  addConstructorCode()
264
265    /**
266     *  Adds a warning to the
267     *  {@link java.lang.SuppressWarnings &#64;SuppressWarnings}
268     *  annotation for the constructor of the new configuration bean.
269     *
270     *  @param  warning The warning to suppress.
271     */
272    protected final void addConstructorSuppressedWarning( final SuppressableWarnings warning )
273    {
274        m_Context.addConstructorSuppressedWarning( warning );
275    }   //  addConstructorSuppressedWarning()
276
277    /**
278     *  Adds the given field to the new class.
279     *
280     *  @param  field   The field to add.
281     */
282    protected final void addField( final FieldSpec field )
283    {
284        m_ClassBuilder.addField( requireNonNullArgument( field, "field" ) );
285    }   //  addField()
286
287    /**
288     *  Adds the given standard field to the new class.
289     *
290     *  @param  reference   The identifier for the standard field.
291     *  @param  field   The field to add.
292     */
293    protected final void addField( final StandardField reference, final FieldSpec field )
294    {
295        addField( field );
296        m_StandardFields.put( requireNonNullArgument( reference, "reference" ), field );
297    }   //  addField()
298
299    /**
300     *  Adds the given method to the new class.
301     *
302     *  @param  method  The method to add.
303     */
304    protected final void addMethod( final MethodSpec method )
305    {
306        m_ClassBuilder.addMethod( requireNonNullArgument( method, "method" ) );
307    }   //  addMethod()
308
309    /**
310     *  Adds the given method to the new class.
311     *
312     *  @param  reference   The identifier for the standard method.
313     *  @param  method  The method to add.
314     */
315    protected final void addMethod( final StandardMethod reference, final MethodSpec method )
316    {
317        addMethod( method );
318        m_StandardMethods.put( requireNonNullArgument( reference, "reference" ), method );
319    }   //  addMethod()
320
321    /**
322     *  {@inheritDoc}
323     */
324    @SuppressWarnings( "AbstractMethodOverridesAbstractMethod" )
325    @Override
326    public abstract void build();
327
328    /**
329     *  The default implementation of the method that composes an 'add' method
330     *  for the given property.
331     *
332     *  @param  codeBuilder The factory for the code generation.
333     *  @param  property    The property.
334     *  @return The method specification.
335     */
336    @SuppressWarnings( {"OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent", "EnhancedSwitchMigration", "UseOfConcreteClass", "StaticMethodOnlyUsedInOneClass"} )
337    public static MethodSpec composeAddMethod( final CodeBuilder codeBuilder, final PropertySpecImpl property )
338    {
339        final var composer = requireNonNullArgument( codeBuilder, "codeBuilder" ).getComposer();
340
341        //---* Obtain the builder *--------------------------------------------
342        final var builder = property.getAddMethodBuilder()
343            .orElseGet( () -> composer.methodBuilder( property.getAddMethodName().get() )
344                .addAnnotation( Override.class )
345                .addModifiers( PUBLIC )
346                .returns( VOID )
347            );
348        builder.addModifiers( FINAL )
349            .addJavadoc( composer.createInheritDocComment() );
350
351        //---* Add the locking *-----------------------------------------------
352        final var lock = property.hasFlag( PROPERTY_REQUIRES_SYNCHRONIZATION ) ? codeBuilder.getField( STD_FIELD_WriteLock ) : null;
353        if( nonNull( lock) ) builder.beginControlFlow(
354            """
355            try( final var l = $N.lock() )
356            """, lock );
357
358        //---* Assign the value *----------------------------------------------
359        final var argumentType = switch( property.getCollectionKind() )
360            {
361                case LIST, SET ->
362                    {
363                        if( property.getPropertyType() instanceof ParameterizedTypeName propertyType )
364                        {
365                            final var typeArguments = propertyType.typeArguments();
366                            yield typeArguments.get( 0 );
367                        }
368                        yield ClassName.from( Object.class );
369                    }
370
371                case MAP ->
372                    {
373                        TypeName keyType = ClassName.from( Object.class );
374                        TypeName valueType = ClassName.from( Object.class );
375                        if( property.getPropertyType() instanceof ParameterizedTypeName propertyType )
376                        {
377                            final var typeArguments = propertyType.typeArguments();
378                            keyType = typeArguments.get( 0 );
379                            valueType = typeArguments.get( 1 );
380                        }
381                        final var entryType = ClassName.from( Map.Entry.class );
382                        yield ParameterizedTypeName.from( entryType, keyType, valueType );
383                    }
384
385                case NO_COLLECTION -> throw new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_NoCollection, property.getAddMethodName().get(), property.getPropertyName() ) );
386
387                default -> throw new UnsupportedEnumError( property.getCollectionKind() );
388            };
389
390        //---* Create the parameter *------------------------------------------
391        final var parameter = composer.parameterOf( argumentType, property.getAddMethodArgumentName(), FINAL );
392        builder.addParameter( parameter );
393
394        //---* Obtain the field *----------------------------------------------
395        final var field = property.getFieldName();
396
397        //---* Create the code *-----------------------------------------------
398        builder.addStatement( "$T oldValue = null", property.getPropertyType() )
399            .beginControlFlow(
400                """
401                if( isNull( $N ) )
402                """, field )
403            .addStaticImport( Objects.class, "isNull" );
404        switch( property.getCollectionKind() )
405        {
406            case LIST:
407            {
408                builder.addStatement( "$1N = new $2T<>()", field, ArrayList.class )
409                    .nextControlFlow(
410                        """
411
412                        else
413                        """ )
414                    .addStatement( "oldValue = $1T.copyOf( $2N )", List.class, field )
415                    .endControlFlow()
416                    .addStatement( "$1N.add( requireNonNullArgument( $2N, $3S ) )", field, parameter, property.getAddMethodArgumentName() )
417                    .addStaticImport( Objects.class, "requireNonNullArgument" )
418                    .addStatement( "$1N.fireEvent( $2S, oldValue, $3T.copyOf( $4N ) )", codeBuilder.getField( STD_FIELD_ListenerSupport ), property.getPropertyName(), List.class, field );
419                break;
420            }
421
422            case MAP:
423            {
424                builder.addStatement( "$1N = new $2T<>()", field, HashMap.class )
425                    .nextControlFlow(
426                        """
427
428                        else
429                        """ )
430                    .addStatement( "oldValue = $T.copyOf( $N )", Map.class, field )
431                    .endControlFlow()
432                    .addStatement( "var key = requireNonNullArgument( $1N, $2S ).getKey()", parameter, property.getAddMethodArgumentName() )
433                    .addStaticImport( Objects.class, "requireNonNullArgument" )
434                    .addStatement( "var value = $N.getValue()", parameter )
435                    .addStatement( "$1N.put( requireNonNullArgument( key, $2S + \".key\" ), requireNonNullArgument( value, $2S + \".value\" ) )", field, property.getAddMethodArgumentName() )
436                    .addStatement( "$1N.fireEvent( $2S, oldValue, $3T.copyOf( $4N ) )", codeBuilder.getField( STD_FIELD_ListenerSupport ), property.getPropertyName(), Map.class, field );
437                break;
438            }
439
440            case SET:
441            {
442                builder.addStatement( "$1N = new $2T<>()", field, HashSet.class )
443                    .nextControlFlow(
444                        """
445
446                        else
447                        """ )
448                    .addStatement( "oldValue = $1T.copyOf( $2N )", Set.class, field )
449                    .endControlFlow()
450                    .addStatement( "$1N.add( requireNonNullArgument( $2N, $3S ) )", field, parameter, property.getAddMethodArgumentName() )
451                    .addStaticImport( Objects.class, "requireNonNullArgument" )
452                    .addStatement( "$1N.fireEvent( $2S, oldValue, $3T.copyOf( $4N ) )", codeBuilder.getField( STD_FIELD_ListenerSupport ), property.getPropertyName(), Set.class, field );
453                break;
454            }
455
456            case NO_COLLECTION: throw new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_NoCollection, property.getAddMethodName().get(), property.getPropertyName() ) );
457
458            default: throw new UnsupportedEnumError( property.getCollectionKind() );
459        }
460        builder.endControlFlow();
461
462        //---* Cleanup *-------------------------------------------------------
463        if( nonNull( lock) ) builder.endControlFlow();
464
465        //---* Create the return value *---------------------------------------
466        final var retValue = builder.build();
467
468        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
469        return retValue;
470    }   //  composeAddMethod()
471
472    /**
473     *  The default implementation of the method that composes a constructor
474     *  fragment for the initialisation of the given property in cases it is
475     *  annotated with
476     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.EnvironmentVariable &#64;EnvironmentVariable}.
477     *
478     *  @param  codeBuilder The factory for the code generation.
479     *  @param  property    The property.
480     *  @return The field specification.
481     */
482    @SuppressWarnings( {"UseOfConcreteClass", "TypeMayBeWeakened", "StaticMethodOnlyUsedInOneClass"} )
483    public static CodeBlock composeConstructorFragment4Environment( final CodeBuilder codeBuilder, final PropertySpecImpl property )
484    {
485        final var builder = requireNonNullArgument( codeBuilder, "codeBuilder" ).getComposer()
486            .codeBlockBuilder()
487            .add(
488                """
489                
490                /*
491                 * Initialise the property '$N' from the system environment.
492                 */
493                """, property.getPropertyName()
494            )
495            .beginControlFlow( EMPTY_STRING );
496
497        //---* Set the StringConverter *---------------------------------------
498        final var stringConverter = property.getStringConverterClass()
499            .orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_MissingStringConverter, property.getPropertyName() ) ) );
500        switch( determineStringConverterInstantiation( stringConverter, property.isEnum() ) )
501        {
502            case BY_INSTANCE -> builder.addStatement( "final var stringConverter = $T.INSTANCE", stringConverter );
503            case THROUGH_CONSTRUCTOR -> builder.addStatement( "final var stringConverter = new $T()", stringConverter );
504            case AS_ENUM -> builder.addStatement( "final var stringConverter = new $1T( $2T.class )", stringConverter, property.getPropertyType() );
505        }
506
507        //---* Set the value *-------------------------------------------------
508        final var defaultValue = property.getEnvironmentDefaultValue();
509        if( defaultValue.isPresent() )
510        {
511            builder.addStatement( "var value = getenv( $1S )", property.getEnvironmentVariableName().orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_MissingEnvironmentVar, property.getPropertyName() ) ) ) )
512                .beginControlFlow(
513                    """
514                        if( isNull( value ) )
515                        """
516                )
517                .addStaticImport( Objects.class, "isNull" )
518                .addStatement( "value = $1S", defaultValue.get() )
519                .endControlFlow();
520        }
521        else
522        {
523            builder.addStatement( "final var value = getenv( $1S )", property.getEnvironmentVariableName().orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_MissingEnvironmentVar, property.getPropertyName() ) ) ) );
524        }
525        builder.addStaticImport( System.class, "getenv" )
526            .addStatement( "$1N = stringConverter.fromString( value )", property.getFieldName() )
527            .endControlFlow();
528
529        //---* Create the return value *---------------------------------------
530        final var retValue = builder.build();
531
532        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
533        return retValue;
534    }   //  composeConstructorFragment4Environment()
535
536    /**
537     *  The default implementation of the method that composes a constructor
538     *  fragment for the initialisation of the given property in cases it is
539     *  annotated with
540     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.EnvironmentVariable &#64;EnvironmentVariable}.
541     *
542     *  @param  codeBuilder The factory for the code generation.
543     *  @param  property    The property.
544     *  @return The field specification.
545     */
546    @SuppressWarnings( {"UseOfConcreteClass", "StaticMethodOnlyUsedInOneClass"} )
547    public static CodeBlock composeConstructorFragment4SystemPreference( final CodeBuilder codeBuilder, final PropertySpecImpl property )
548    {
549        final var composer = requireNonNullArgument( codeBuilder, "codeBuilder" ).getComposer();
550
551        /*
552         * Create the lambdas for the getter and the setter.
553         * The getter is not used, but required for the constructor of the
554         * PropertyAccess instance.
555         */
556        final var getter = composer.lambdaBuilder()
557            .addCode( "$N", requireNonNullArgument( property, "property" ).getFieldName() )
558            .build();
559        final var setter = composer.lambdaBuilder()
560            .addParameter( "p" )
561            .addCode( "$N = p", property.getFieldName() )
562            .build();
563
564        //---* The accessor class *--------------------------------------------
565        final var accessorClass = property.getPrefsAccessorClass()
566            .orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_AccessorMissing, property.getPropertyName() ) ) );
567
568        //---* The path to the node *------------------------------------------
569        final var path = property.getSystemPrefsPath()
570            .orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_PreferencesNotConfigured, property.getPropertyName() ) ) );
571
572        //---* The key for the value *-----------------------------------------
573        final var key = property.getPrefsKey()
574            .orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_PreferencesNotConfigured, property.getPropertyName() ) ) );
575
576        final var builder = composer
577            .codeBlockBuilder()
578            .add(
579                """
580                
581                /*
582                 * Initialise the property '$N' from the SYSTEM {@code Preferences}.
583                 *
584                 * Path: $L
585                 * Key : $L
586                 */
587                """, property.getPropertyName(), path, key
588            )
589            .beginControlFlow(
590                """
591                try
592                """ )
593            .beginControlFlow(
594                """
595                if( systemRoot().nodeExists( $S ) )
596                """, path )
597            .addStaticImport( Preferences.class, "systemRoot" )
598            .addStatement( "final var node = systemRoot().node( $S )", path );
599
600        //noinspection IfStatementWithTooManyBranches
601        if( accessorClass.equals( ENUM_ACCESSOR_TYPE ) )
602        {
603            final var propertyType = property.getPropertyType();
604            builder.addStatement( "final var accessor = new $2T<>( $1S, $3T.class, $4L, $5L )", key, accessorClass, propertyType, getter, setter );
605        }
606        else if( accessorClass.equals( LIST_ACCESSOR_TYPE ) || accessorClass.equals( SET_ACCESSOR_TYPE ) )
607        {
608            final var propertyType = (ParameterizedTypeName) property.getPropertyType();
609            final var argumentType = propertyType.typeArguments().get( 0 );
610            final var stringConverterType = getStringConverter( argumentType )
611                .orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_MissingStringConverterWithType, property.getPropertyName(), argumentType.toString() ) ) );
612            switch( determineStringConverterInstantiation( stringConverterType, false ) )
613            {
614                case BY_INSTANCE -> builder.addStatement( "final var accessor = new $2T<>( $1S, $3T.INSTANCE, $4L, $5L )", key, accessorClass, stringConverterType, getter, setter );
615                case THROUGH_CONSTRUCTOR -> builder.addStatement( "final var accessor = new $2T<>( $1S, new $3T(), $4L, $5L )", key, accessorClass, stringConverterType, getter, setter );
616                case AS_ENUM -> builder.addStatement( "final var accessor = new $2T<>( $1S, new $3T( $6T.class ), $4L, $5L )", key, accessorClass, stringConverterType, getter, setter, propertyType );
617            }
618        }
619        else if( accessorClass.equals( MAP_ACCESSOR_TYPE ) )
620        {
621            final var propertyType = (ParameterizedTypeName) property.getPropertyType();
622            final var argumentTypes = propertyType.typeArguments();
623            final var keyStringConverterType = getStringConverter( argumentTypes.get( 0 ) )
624                .orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_MissingStringConverterWithType, property.getPropertyName(), argumentTypes.get( 0 ).toString() ) ) );
625            final var keySnippet =
626                switch( determineStringConverterInstantiation( keyStringConverterType, false ) )
627                {
628                    case BY_INSTANCE -> "$3T.INSTANCE";
629                    case THROUGH_CONSTRUCTOR -> "new $3T()";
630                    case AS_ENUM -> EMPTY_STRING;
631                };
632            final var valueStringConverterType = getStringConverter( argumentTypes.get( 1 ) )
633                .orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_MissingStringConverterWithType, property.getPropertyName(), argumentTypes.get( 1 ).toString() ) ) );
634            final var valueSnippet =
635                switch( determineStringConverterInstantiation( valueStringConverterType, false ) )
636                {
637                    case BY_INSTANCE -> "$4T.INSTANCE";
638                    case THROUGH_CONSTRUCTOR -> "new $4T()";
639                    case AS_ENUM -> EMPTY_STRING;
640                };
641            builder.addStatement( format( "final var accessor = new $2T<>( $1S, %1$s, %2$s, $5L, $6L )", keySnippet, valueSnippet ), key, accessorClass, keyStringConverterType, valueStringConverterType, getter, setter );
642        }
643        else if( accessorClass.equals( DEFAULT_ACCESSOR_TYPE ) )
644        {
645            final var stringConverterType = property.getStringConverterClass()
646                .orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_MissingStringConverter, property.getPropertyName() ) ) );
647            switch( determineStringConverterInstantiation( stringConverterType, property.isEnum() ) )
648            {
649                case BY_INSTANCE -> builder.addStatement( "final var accessor = new $2T<>( $1S, $4L, $5L, $3T.INSTANCE )", key, accessorClass, stringConverterType, getter, setter );
650                case THROUGH_CONSTRUCTOR -> builder.addStatement( "final var accessor = new $2T<>( $1S, $4L, $5L, new $3T() )", key, accessorClass, stringConverterType, getter, setter );
651                case AS_ENUM -> builder.addStatement( "final var accessor = new $2T<>( $1S, $4L, $5L, new $3T( $6T.class ) )", key, accessorClass, stringConverterType, getter, setter, property.getPropertyType() );
652            }
653        }
654        else
655        {
656            builder.addStatement( "final var accessor = new $2T( $1S, $3L, $4L )", key, accessorClass, getter, setter );
657        }
658
659        //---* Add the code to read the Preferences *--------------------------
660        builder.addStatement( "accessor.readPreference( node )" )
661            .endControlFlow()
662            .nextControlFlow(
663                """
664        
665                catch( final $T e )
666                """, BackingStoreException.class )
667            .addStatement( "throw new $T( e )", ExceptionInInitializerError.class )
668            .endControlFlow();
669
670        //---* Create the return value *---------------------------------------
671        final var retValue = builder.build();
672
673        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
674        return retValue;
675    }   //  composeConstructorFragment4SystemPreference()
676
677    /**
678     *  The default implementation of the method that composes a constructor
679     *  fragment for the initialisation of the given property in cases it is
680     *  annotated with
681     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.config.EnvironmentVariable &#64;EnvironmentVariable}.
682     *
683     *  @param  codeBuilder The factory for the code generation.
684     *  @param  property    The property.
685     *  @return The field specification.
686     */
687    @SuppressWarnings( {"UseOfConcreteClass", "TypeMayBeWeakened", "StaticMethodOnlyUsedInOneClass"} )
688    public static CodeBlock composeConstructorFragment4SystemProp( final CodeBuilder codeBuilder, final PropertySpecImpl property )
689    {
690        final var builder = requireNonNullArgument( codeBuilder, "codeBuilder" ).getComposer()
691            .codeBlockBuilder()
692            .add(
693                """
694                
695                /*
696                 * Initialise the property '$N' from the system properties.
697                 */
698                """, property.getPropertyName()
699            )
700            .beginControlFlow( EMPTY_STRING );
701
702        //---* Set the StringConverter *---------------------------------------
703        final var stringConverter = property.getStringConverterClass()
704            .orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_MissingStringConverter, property.getPropertyName() ) ) );
705        switch( determineStringConverterInstantiation( stringConverter, property.isEnum() ) )
706        {
707            case BY_INSTANCE -> builder.addStatement( "final var stringConverter = $T.INSTANCE", stringConverter );
708            case THROUGH_CONSTRUCTOR -> builder.addStatement( "final var stringConverter = new $T()", stringConverter );
709            case AS_ENUM -> builder.addStatement( "final var stringConverter = new $1T( $2T.class )", stringConverter, property.getPropertyType() );
710        }
711
712        //---* Set the value *-------------------------------------------------
713        final var defaultValue = property.getEnvironmentDefaultValue();
714        if( defaultValue.isPresent() )
715        {
716            builder.addStatement( "final var value = getProperty( $1S, $2S )", property.getSystemPropertyName().orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_MissingSystemProp, property.getPropertyName() ) ) ), defaultValue.get() );
717        }
718        else
719        {
720            builder.addStatement( "final var value = getProperty( $1S )", property.getSystemPropertyName().orElseThrow( () -> new CodeGenerationError( format( MSG_MissingSystemProp, property.getPropertyName() ) ) ) );
721        }
722        builder.addStaticImport( System.class, "getProperty" )
723            .addStatement( "$1N = stringConverter.fromString( value )", property.getFieldName() )
724            .endControlFlow();
725
726        //---* Create the return value *---------------------------------------
727        final var retValue = builder.build();
728
729        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
730        return retValue;
731    }   //  composeConstructorFragment4SystemProp()
732
733    /**
734     *  The default implementation of the method that composes a field for the
735     *  given property.
736     *
737     *  @param  codeBuilder The factory for the code generation.
738     *  @param  property    The property.
739     *  @return The field specification.
740     */
741    @SuppressWarnings( {"UseOfConcreteClass", "StaticMethodOnlyUsedInOneClass"} )
742    public static FieldSpec composeField( final CodeBuilder codeBuilder, final PropertySpecImpl property )
743    {
744        final var composer = requireNonNullArgument( codeBuilder, "codeBuilder" ).getComposer();
745
746        final var builder = composer.fieldBuilder( property.getPropertyType(), property.getFieldName(), PRIVATE )
747            .addJavadoc(
748                """
749                Property: &quot;$L&quot;.
750                """, property.getPropertyName() );
751        if( Stream.of( PROPERTY_IS_MUTABLE, PROPERTY_IS_OPTION, PROPERTY_IS_ARGUMENT, ALLOWS_PREFERENCES, SYSTEM_PREFERENCE ).noneMatch( property::hasFlag ) )
752        {
753            builder.addModifiers( FINAL );
754        }
755
756        //---* Create the return value *--------------------------------------
757        final var retValue = builder.build();
758
759        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
760        return retValue;
761    }   //  composeField()
762
763    /**
764     *  The default implementation of the method that composes a getter for the
765     *  given property.
766     *
767     *  @param  codeBuilder The factory for the code generation.
768     *  @param  property    The property.
769     *  @return The method specification.
770     */
771    @SuppressWarnings( {"OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent", "UseOfConcreteClass", "TypeMayBeWeakened", "StaticMethodOnlyUsedInOneClass"} )
772    public static MethodSpec composeGetter( final CodeBuilder codeBuilder, final PropertySpecImpl property )
773    {
774        final var composer = requireNonNullArgument( codeBuilder, "codeBuilder" ).getComposer();
775
776        //---* Obtain the builder *--------------------------------------------
777        final var builder = property.getGetterBuilder()
778            .orElseGet( () -> composer.methodBuilder( property.getGetterMethodName().get() )
779                .addAnnotation( Override.class )
780                .addModifiers( PUBLIC )
781                .returns( property.getGetterReturnType() )
782            );
783        builder.addModifiers( FINAL )
784            .addJavadoc( composer.createInheritDocComment() );
785
786        //---* Add the locking *-----------------------------------------------
787        final var lock = property.hasFlag( PROPERTY_REQUIRES_SYNCHRONIZATION ) && property.hasFlag( PROPERTY_IS_MUTABLE )
788                         ? codeBuilder.getField( STD_FIELD_ReadLock )
789                         : null;
790        if( nonNull( lock) ) builder.beginControlFlow(
791            """
792            try( final var ignored = $N.lock() )
793            """, lock );
794
795        //---* Return the value *----------------------------------------------
796        if( property.hasFlag( GETTER_RETURNS_OPTIONAL ) )
797        {
798            builder.addStatement( "return $1T.ofNullable( $2N )", Optional.class, property.getFieldName() );
799        }
800        else
801        {
802            builder.addStatement( "return $1N", property.getFieldName() );
803        }
804
805        //---* Cleanup *-------------------------------------------------------
806        if( nonNull( lock) ) builder.endControlFlow();
807
808        //---* Create the return value *---------------------------------------
809        final var retValue = builder.build();
810
811        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
812        return retValue;
813    }   //  composeGetter()
814
815    /**
816     *  The default implementation of the method that composes a setter for the
817     *  given property.
818     *
819     *  @param  codeBuilder The factory for the code generation.
820     *  @param  property    The property.
821     *  @return The method specification.
822     */
823    @SuppressWarnings( {"OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent", "UseOfConcreteClass", "TypeMayBeWeakened", "StaticMethodOnlyUsedInOneClass"} )
824    public static MethodSpec composeSetter( final CodeBuilder codeBuilder, final PropertySpecImpl property )
825    {
826        final var composer = requireNonNullArgument( codeBuilder, "codeBuilder" ).getComposer();
827
828        //---* Obtain the builder *--------------------------------------------
829        final var builder = property.getSetterBuilder()
830            .orElseGet( () -> composer.methodBuilder( property.getSetterMethodName().get() )
831                .addAnnotation( Override.class )
832                .addModifiers( PUBLIC )
833                .addParameter( composer.parameterOf( property.getPropertyType(), property.getSetterArgumentName(), FINAL ) )
834                .returns( VOID )
835            );
836        builder.addModifiers( FINAL )
837            .addJavadoc( composer.createInheritDocComment() );
838
839        //---* Add the locking *-----------------------------------------------
840        final var lock = property.hasFlag( PROPERTY_REQUIRES_SYNCHRONIZATION ) ? codeBuilder.getField( STD_FIELD_WriteLock ) : null;
841        if( nonNull( lock) ) builder.beginControlFlow(
842            """
843            try( final var ignored = $N.lock() )
844            """, lock );
845
846        //---* Assign the value *----------------------------------------------
847        if( property.hasFlag( SETTER_CHECK_EMPTY ) )
848        {
849            final var methodName = "requireNotEmptyArgument";
850            builder.addStatement(
851                    """
852                    final var newValue = $2N( $1N, $1S )\
853                    """, property.getSetterArgumentName(), methodName )
854                .addStaticImport( Objects.class, methodName );
855        }
856        else if( property.hasFlag( SETTER_CHECK_NULL ) )
857        {
858            final var methodName = "requireNonNullArgument";
859            builder.addStatement(
860                    """
861                    final var newValue = $2N( $1N, $1S )\
862                    """, property.getSetterArgumentName(), methodName )
863                .addStaticImport( Objects.class, methodName );
864        }
865        else
866        {
867            builder.addStatement(
868                """
869                final var newValue = $1N\
870                """, property.getSetterArgumentName() );
871        }
872        builder.addStatement(
873                """
874                $1N.fireEvent( $2S, $3N, newValue )\
875                """, codeBuilder.getField( STD_FIELD_ListenerSupport ), property.getPropertyName(), property.getFieldName() )
876            .addStatement(
877                """
878                $1N = newValue\
879                """, property.getFieldName() );
880
881        //---* Cleanup *-------------------------------------------------------
882        if( nonNull( lock) ) builder.endControlFlow();
883
884        //---* Create the return value *---------------------------------------
885        final var retValue = builder.build();
886
887        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
888        return retValue;
889    }   //  composeSetter()
890
891    /**
892     *  Determines how to instantiate the given implementation of
893     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.StringConverter}.
894     *
895     *  @param  stringConverterClass    The String converter class.
896     *  @param  isEnum  {@code true} if the property is of an
897     *      {@link Enum enum} type, {@code false} otherwise.
898     *  @return The type of instantiation.
899     */
900    @SuppressWarnings( "TryWithIdenticalCatches" )
901    protected static final StringConverterInstantiation determineStringConverterInstantiation( final TypeName stringConverterClass, final boolean isEnum )
902    {
903        var retValue = THROUGH_CONSTRUCTOR;
904        if( requireNonNullArgument( stringConverterClass, "stringConverterClass" ) instanceof ClassName className )
905        {
906            try
907            {
908                final var candidateClass = Class.forName( className.canonicalName(), false, CodeBuilderBase.class.getClassLoader() );
909                final var field = candidateClass.getField( "INSTANCE" );
910                final var modifiers = field.getModifiers();
911                retValue = field.canAccess( null ) && isPublic( modifiers ) && isStatic( modifiers ) ? BY_INSTANCE : THROUGH_CONSTRUCTOR;
912            }
913            catch( @SuppressWarnings( "unused" ) final NoSuchFieldException | SecurityException e )
914            {
915                /*
916                 * There is no INSTANCE field, or it is not static, or not public,
917                 * or it is otherwise not accessible to this method.
918                 */
919                retValue = THROUGH_CONSTRUCTOR;
920            }
921            catch( @SuppressWarnings( "unused" ) final ClassNotFoundException e )
922            {
923                /*
924                 * The class for the StringConverter implementation does not
925                 * exist.
926                 */
927                retValue = THROUGH_CONSTRUCTOR;
928            }
929        }
930        if( (retValue == THROUGH_CONSTRUCTOR) && isEnum )
931        {
932            retValue = AS_ENUM;
933        }
934
935        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
936        return retValue;
937    }   //  determineStringConverterInstantiation
938
939    /**
940     *  {@inheritDoc}
941     */
942    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
943    @Override
944    public final JavaComposer getComposer() { return m_Composer; }
945
946    /**
947     *  {@inheritDoc}
948     */
949    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
950    @Override
951    public final CodeGenerationConfiguration getConfiguration() { return m_Configuration; }
952
953    /**
954     *  {@inheritDoc}
955     */
956    @Override
957    public final FieldSpec getField( final StandardField reference )
958    {
959        final var retValue = m_StandardFields.get( requireNonNullArgument( reference, "reference" ) );
960
961        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
962        return retValue;
963    }   //  getField()
964
965    /**
966     *  {@inheritDoc}
967     */
968    @Override
969    public final MethodSpec getMethod( final StandardMethod reference )
970    {
971        final var retValue = m_StandardMethods.get( requireNonNullArgument( reference, "reference" ) );
972
973        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
974        return retValue;
975    }   //  getMethod()

977    /**
978     *  Returns an iterator over the configured properties.
979     *
980     *  @return The iterator.
981     */
982    protected final Iterator<PropertySpec> getProperties() { return m_Configuration.propertyIterator(); }
983
984    /**
985     *  Returns the
986     *  {@link StringConverter}
987     *  type for the given type.
988     *
989     *  @param  type    The type.
990     *  @return An instance of
991     *      {@link Optional}
992     *      that holds the requested implementation of
993     *      {@code StringConverter}.
994     */
995    protected static final Optional<TypeName> getStringConverter( final TypeName type )
996    {
997        final var retValue = Optional.ofNullable( m_ConverterRegistry.get( requireNonNullArgument( type, "type" ) ) );
998
999        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1000        return retValue;
1001    }   //  getStringConverter()
1002
1003    /**
1004     *  Returns the flag that controls whether the configuration bean has to be
1005     *  generated thread safe.
1006     *
1007     *  @return {@code true} if lock support is required, {@code false}
1008     *      otherwise.
1009     */
1010    protected final boolean isSynchronized() { return m_IsSynchronized; }
1011
1012    /**
1013     *  The implementation of
1014     *  {@link Supplier}
1015     *  that loads the known
1016     *  {@link StringConverter}
1017     *  instances for
1018     *  {@link #m_ConverterRegistry}.
1019     *
1020     *  @return The String converters.
1021     *
1022     *  @see    LazyMap#use(boolean, Supplier)
1023     */
1024    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfObsoleteDateTimeApi" )
1025    private static final Map<TypeName,TypeName> loadStringConverters()
1026    {
1027        final Map<TypeName,TypeName> retValue = new HashMap<>();
1028        retValue.put( TypeName.from( Date.class ), TypeName.from( DateLongStringConverter.class ) );
1029        for( final var type : StringConverter.list() )
1030        {
1031            @SuppressWarnings( "rawtypes" )
1032            final Class<? extends StringConverter> converterClass;
1033            try
1034            {
1035                converterClass = StringConverter.forClass( type )
1036                    .orElseThrow()
1037                    .getClass();
1038            }
1039            catch( final NoSuchElementException e )
1040            {
1041                throw new UnexpectedExceptionError( e );
1042            }
1043            retValue.put( TypeName.from( type ), TypeName.from( converterClass ) );
1044        }
1045
1046        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1047        return retValue;
1048    }   //  loadStringConverters()
1049}
1050//  class CodeBuilderBase
1051

1053 *  End of File
